As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay 2 life. If you do, that creature gains menace and haste until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control dies, create a Junk token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
